fields.label: Vprašanje
fields.description: Neobvezno vprašanje za kartico. Na kartici je lahko samo slika, samo besedilo ali oboje.

fields.label: Slika
fields.description: Neobvezna slika za kartico. Na kartici je lahko samo slika, samo besedilo ali oboje.

semantics.label: Besedilo napredka
semantics.description: Spremenljivki v besedilu napredka sta @card in @total.

semantics.label: Pred ogledom rešitve je potrebno podati vse odgovore
Besedilo za polje za vnos odgovorov
Loči velike/male črke
semantics.description: Razlikuje med zapisom v velikih ali malih tiskanih črkah.

semantics.label: Incorrect text for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies. Use @answer as variable.

semantics.label: Correct feedback text for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies when a card is answered correctly. Use @answer as variable.

semantics.label: Card change for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies when navigating between cards. Use @current and @total as variables.

semantics.label: Audio play button
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies as label for play button.

semantics.label: Audio pause button
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies as label for pause button.

semantics.label: Audio not supported message
semantics.default: Your browser does not support this audio.
semantics.description: Text to report that the browser cannot play the audio file.
